item.title: Apple is recalling Beats speakers and offering refunds
item.description:
Apple initiated a voluntary recall of Beats Pill XL speakers due to a potential fire safety risk. The company determined that in rare cases, the battery in these speakers may overheat. This recall only affects the specific Beats Pill XL speaker model shown in the images and no other Beats or Apple products. Apple prioritizes customer safety and urges all Beats Pill XL users to stop using their devices. To return their speakers and receive a refund of US$325 (or equivalent in local currency) as Apple Store credit or electronic payment, owners can visit www...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/apple-is-recalling-beats-speakers-and-offering-refunds/
